string-array.name: slogan_array_zh
string-array.item: 未曾清贫难成人，不经打击老天真。
自古英雄出炼狱，从来富贵入凡尘。
醉生梦死谁成器，拓马长枪定乾坤。
挥军千里山河在，立名扬威传后人。

string-array.name: slogan_array_en
string-array.item: Never be poor or hard to grow up, never be naive.
From ancient times heroes went out of purgatory, from wealth to mortality.
Drunk life, dream death, who become a weapon, Tuo Ma long gun to determine the universe.
Swing the army thousands of miles in the mountains and rivers, the name of the descendants.
